direct_enhancements.reason: Both methods provide a preview of subscription details but for different types of products (flexible vs. locked).
Both methods involve subscription processes with similar parameter handling and control flows.
Both methods access and manipulate product-related data, though for different purposes (listing vs. preview).
Both methods involve checking or modifying subscription-related state information.
Both methods handle similar types of exceptions related to subscription processes.

enhanced_by.reason: Initialization of the request handler is required before any subscription-related operations.
Fetching the list of flexible products is often necessary before previewing a subscription.
Verification of the subscription preview output is crucial to ensure the correctness of the preview process.
